notes.text:
Don't overmix - lumpy batter makes fluffier pancakes
Keep cooked pancakes warm in a low oven
Add blueberries to the batter for extra flavor

steps.descr: Mix flour, baking powder, and sugar in a bowl

on_enter.say: Right, let's start by mixing the flour, baking powder, and sugar in a bowl. Give it a good stir until everything's combined.

steps.instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, and sugar in a bowl

on_enter.say: Now, let's whisk the egg and milk together until they're beautifully combined. You want a nice, smooth mixture here.

steps.descr: Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed

on_enter.say: Let's bring it all together now. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry and gently mix until just combined. Remember, a few lumps are okay!

steps.instructions: Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed

steps.descr: Heat butter in a pan over medium heat

on_enter.say: Time to get the pan ready. Heat some butter over medium heat until it's melted and sizzling slightly. You'll know it's ready when it starts to foam.

steps.instructions: Heat butter in a pan over medium heat

steps.descr: Pour small ladles of batter into pan

on_enter.say: Let's get those pancakes cooking! Pour small ladles of batter into the pan, leaving a bit of space between each one. They should sizzle as they hit the pan.

steps.instructions: Pour small ladles of batter into pan

steps.descr: Cook until bubbles appear, flip and cook other side

on_enter.say: Keep an eye on those pancakes. When you see bubbles forming on the surface, it's time to flip them. Cook until both sides are golden brown.

steps.instructions: Cook until bubbles appear, flip and cook other side

steps.descr: Serve stacked with syrup and fresh berries

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Stack those fluffy pancakes high, drizzle with maple syrup, and scatter some fresh berries on top. Enjoy your delicious creation!

steps.instructions: Serve stacked with syrup and fresh berries

recipe.title: Fluffy Pancakes
recipe.description: Light and fluffy American-style breakfast pancakes

ingredients.name: Maple syrup and berries to serve
